name: Crimson Chrysanthemum
description: Bold and introspective — a flower that blooms where silence feels powerful.

name: Midnight Hellebore
description: Dark, rare, and poetic — beauty that survives even in cold stillness.

name: Amber Rose
description: Warmth wrapped in shadow — a glowing ember in the quiet dark.

name: Indigo Morning Glory
description: A fleeting mystery — blooms briefly, but leaves a lasting emotion.
